definition: Pingshan county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Fuping Group in Pingshan County, Hebei Province, is a suite of high-grade amphibolite-facies rocks.
sentences.chinese: 河北省平山縣阜平羣是一套高角門巖相岩石。
